Graduated Feb 2023 from Massey University
Additional Certifications #Certification Date ITIL Foundation Certificate in IT Service Management Dec 2020 Lean Six Sigma Green Belt June 2021 Work Experience #Support Coordinator Jan 2023 - PresentIntegration Technologies Ltd.Effectively managed customer support and issue resolution, reducing the average age of open tickets by over 80%.Assisted in development and deployment of clean, scalable code in C# (and the .NET framework) to maintain various products.Performed unit testing, debugging, and troubleshooting to ensure the quality and reliability of the software.Coordinated support and project activities between technical and non-technical stakeholders to ensure alignment of expectations.Tracked support metrics across cross-functional teams and generated reports to assess performance and identify areas for improvement.Software Developer Feb 2022 - Jan 2023Massey UniversityDeveloped and customised software solutions using the Tribal SITS platform, specializing in student information systems.Collaborated closely with stakeholders, including academic administrators, finance teams, and student services, to understand requirements and tailor solutions to meet organisational needs.Configured and extended the functionality of the SITS platform using proprietary tools and scripting languages such as SRL (SITS Rule Language) and SRL++.Conducted thorough testing and validation of developed solutions to ensure accuracy, reliability, and compliance with regulatory standards in the education sector.Provided ongoing support, maintenance, and enhancements to existing SITS implementations, troubleshooting issues, and implementing updates as necessary to optimize performance and usability.Service Desk Analyst Oct 2019 - Feb 2022Massey UniversityProvided first and second level technical support for desktop computing environments, including hardware, software, and peripherals for over 8000 customers.Effectively routed, tracked, and managed customersâ€™ service desk tickets from inception to closing and documented issues and results in ITSM software Axios Assyst.Responded to user inquiries and troubleshot issues via phone, email, or remote desktop to ensure timely resolution and minimize downtime.Collaborated with other IT teams to escalate complex issues and participated in ongoing training to enhance technical skills and knowledge.Thoroughly documented support activities, including resolutions and troubleshooting steps, to create a thorough knowledge base for future reference and training purposes.
